Subskills.name: The Huntsman
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of chain swing.

Subskills.name: Immobilizing Hit
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Warm Welcome
Subskills.description: Unleash burning fissures at nearby monsters when landing inflicting burning.

Subskills.name: No Quarter
Subskills.description: Reduces the mana cost of chain swing.

Subskills.name: Demonic Chains
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chain swing.

Subskills.name: Introduce Fear
Subskills.description: Pull monsters towards you from an increased radius after landing.

Subskills.name: Physical Torture
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Killing Spree
Subskills.description: Grants you a burst of attack speed after landing for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Centrifugal Force
Subskills.description: Chain swing maximum length is significantly shorter but can be targeted. Spin around the target ignoring collision. Monsters hit by the chain take increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Scent of Prey
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Entry Frenzy
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by chain swing.

Subskills.name: Unblessed Path
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range. Chain swing now ignores terrain.

Subskills.name: Hookstorm
Subskills.description: Swing hooks around while travelling grabbing monsters on your path dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Prey of the Day
Subskills.description: Connecting with a monster causes chain swing to pull all monsters nearby the target towards you.
